string.text: Have you heard a young BEASTER HUNTER, the story of a teenager shooting down a jumbo brown bear?Yes, that's me. The people in the village call me.

I have been interested in bows shot with arrows since I was a child. Is the one of the village best hunters. Then, one time, the village was caught with Starving. The blue blood friend call me to hunt some game in forest with him.

Unfortunately, noting in forest, like hare or dear. Nothing. But a colossus was coming out. A huge brown bear! Try to slaught my friend. I immediate shot an arrow into it critical viscera. Friend alive, and the bear dead. After that, the folks call me BEASTER HUNTER.
In several hunts since that, we argue with the share. My man tells me I have shared some more to village after back to the village. We start a fight, end with my man dead.
That's... a bad Move. I geuss you lose every things with it.
What a crime! You have to expiate your sin.
Right. Then I had been banished from village. But I can keep my seax and bow. And I traveling around, final in this tarvern. Looking for someone hire me to hunt.
